Text: Sorry guys, this is X-Play. My mistake

Show Info:

Starhawk Single-Player Exclusive Preview
The PS3 multiplayer beta for Starhawk gave everyone a feel for what the game's online play would be like, but what about the single-player? Find out in an exclusive preview.

:30 Seconds of Awesome - Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
We told you something strange was up with Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance. Find out what in another edition of :30 Seconds of Awesome.

Madden NFL 13 Gameplay Preview
The new edition of Madden NFL is designed to feel more like a TV broadcast than ever, with dynamic commentary, changes to the gameplay, and much more.

Videogame Deathmatch: The Greatest Story Ever Told
Weeks of voting has come down to this - Mass Effect vs. God of War for the Videogame Deathmatch honor of greatest story ever told in a video game, and on tonight's show we'll announce the winner.

Know Your Roots - Double Dragon 25th Anniversary
25 years ago, brothers Billy and Jimmy hit the mean streets in Double Dragon, and an arcade classic was born. With a remake on the way, it's a perfect time to Know Your Roots.

Mortal Kombat PS Vita Gameplay Preview
Mortal Kombat on the PS Vita adds over a hundred missions to the Challenge Tower, all the DLC characters, and even a Fruit Ninja-style minigame.

The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Review
The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings comes to the Xbox 360 loaded with new content, and we'll let you know if it works in our review.
